import React from 'react'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const ConfirmationScreen = ({ inputType, inputBase, inputMagicEffects, inputScent, totalPrice, qtyInCart }) => { return ( <>

Amazing, your potion is ready!

IT ‘S TIME TO NAME IS



TYPE: {inputType}
BASE: {inputBase}
MAGIC EFFECTS: { inputMagicEffects.map((effect) => {`${effect}`} ) }
SCENT: {inputScent}
Price: €{totalPrice}0

); }; export default ConfirmationScreen;
